description: This is the main entry point for a Flutter mobile application. It defines the main application widget, a home page, and the app's UI structure with an AppBar, some text, and a progress indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Stateless widget that sets up the application theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main screen with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage that builds the UI with an AppBar and a message indicating app generation progress.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the Dart application, calling runApp with the root widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and MyHomePage, defining the UI layout.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage widget.
